name: Three Cars
description:
Control 3 cars driving along an endless highway and change lanes to avoid collisions with other traffic or between the cars themselves. Score a point for every vehicle you overtake! 

Inspired by and featuring the song 'Three Cars' by UK indie-folk group Sandtimer. Find the song on all streaming services at: https://song.link/gb/i/1568757597.

Controls

Q + A - Move upper car up or down

E + D - Move middle car up or down

T + G - Move lower car up or down
